function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased zoonotic infections due to deforestation and wildlife hunting","Impact":"Higher risk of diseases transmitted from animals to humans","Mitigation":"Implement strict regulations on deforestation and wildlife hunting","Technologies":"Satellite monitoring for deforestation detection","People":"Communities living near forests","Owner":"Government and environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Deterioration of biodiversity reduces ecosystem functioning and protective effects against infectious diseases","Impact":"Decreased resilience against infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Conservation and restoration of biodiversity hotspots","Technologies":"Biological monitoring and conservation technology","People":"Conservation organizations, environmental scientists","Owner":"Government, NGOs"},{"Description":"Intensive animal husbandry promotes the appearance and spread of zoonotic diseases","Impact":"Higher prevalence of diseases in animals and humans","Mitigation":"Improved animal husbandry practices and biosecurity measures","Technologies":"Biosecurity systems and disease monitoring technologies","People":"Animal farmers, livestock owners","Owner":"Agricultural and veterinary agencies"}]}
